name: Shh Baby..
description:
Shh Baby...Sleep don't Weep

Created for Global Game Jam 2017 - Abu Dhabi city site, by Ali Hassan and Fakhra AlMansouri.

It's a simulation mobile game for putting a baby to sleep, by waving/swinging your phone to control the speed of the lullaby. You have to smoothly swing it to create a nice rhythm to keep the baby sleeping.
